The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en:
1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order
2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order
3.Laplace transforms
4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.zh:
1. 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：
(1)電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，
(2)電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，
(3)一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，
(4)穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，
(5)電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
2. 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：
(1)交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，
(2)三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，
(3)變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，
(4)頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，
(5)Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，
(6)Laplace轉換及應用。
description.en:
The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include:
1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis, 2. Resistive circuit, 3. Kirchhoff laws, 4. Thevenin and Norton theorem, 5. First and second order circuit, 6. Node and loop analysis, 7. Steady state response and analysis, 8. SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en:
The experiment covers the basic architecture and application 
of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:
1.The usage of PC
2.The usage of microcomputer training machine
3.Logic analysis
4.The design and debug of assembly language
5.ROM/RAM design
6.I/O design and control

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1.光電工程概論，2.基礎光學，3.電射發光原理，4.雷射光的調製，5.光電科技應用概論。
description.en:
The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise
1.Introduction 
2.Fundamentals of optics
3.Laser principles
4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams
5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2.物件導向與資料抽象化3.類別與方法 4.訊息﹐實例與初始化 5.繼承 6.靜態與動態繫結 7.多型性 8.發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介10.應用程式實例介紹
description.en:
1.Programming Language Paradigms  
2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  
3.Classes and Methods 
4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 
5.Inheritance  
6.Static and Dynamic Binding
7.Polymorphism  
8.Environment and Tools  
9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 
10.Case Study

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en:
1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order
2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order
3.Laplace transforms
4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.zh:
1. 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：
(1)電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，
(2)電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，
(3)一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，
(4)穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，
(5)電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
2. 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：
(1)交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，
(2)三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，
(3)變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，
(4)頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，
(5)Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，
(6)Laplace轉換及應用。
description.en:
The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include:
1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis, 2. Resistive circuit, 3. Kirchhoff laws, 4. Thevenin and Norton theorem, 5. First and second order circuit, 6. Node and loop analysis, 7. Steady state response and analysis, 8. SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

notes: 四資二與四子二乙合開；電子系必修、資工系為選修

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。

Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us g

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。

In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 使學生建立邏輯量化思考，並了解管理科學解決問題之方法及應用，且有能力利用電腦工具協助分析經營管理問題，達成最佳化決策。
description.en: To build the quantitative logic thinking about the decision problems. The course is designed to introduce the fundamental techniques and methods of operations research. The related software will be utilized to aid in building and solving models. The topics to be covered: linear programming, what-if analysis, dual theory, transportation and assignment.

description.zh:
本課程針對電腦初學者所設計，課程依照初學者最需要的電腦入門知識和技能，從基本的網路原理及、網路資源教起，讓同學可以充份掌握並利用並利用網路資源。本課程亦教授網頁編輯觀念教您如何規劃網站架構、再加上互動式表單及動態網頁效果的完整說明,讓同學也能製作出具有專業水準的網站。
本課程分為「電腦基礎」和「網際網路」等二部份：
(1) 電腦基礎篇：介紹最熱門的網路觀念與操作技巧，內容涵括知識性的網路相關知識，包括網路與Internet發展，以及資訊安全等題材；另外還有操作性的課題，包括WWW與網路搜尋、E-mail電子郵件、HTML網頁製作、FTP檔案傳輸與網站發佈等；學會上網找資料、收發電子郵件、使用即時通訊軟體。
(2) 網際網路篇：學會製作個人網頁等技巧。製作網頁以FrontPage中文版的各項基本功能為主，內容包括網站的建立、圖文網頁編輯、表格與超連結、導覽列與共用邊框、分割框架與多媒體互動網頁設計，以及網站的發佈與管理等，讓同學可以完整學習利用FrontPage來編製網頁的編輯技巧。
description.en:
This course is designed for the students who want to handle the resource of internet. The is course composed of two parts:（1）The concept of internet and the application program（2）
Learning how to build up the website by using Microsoft FrontPage.

notes: 四工二甲、乙合開；計網電腦教室，限40人

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us g

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 使學生建立邏輯量化思考，並了解管理科學解決問題之方法及應用，且有能力利用電腦工具協助分析經營管理問題，達成最佳化決策。
description.en: To build the quantitative logic thinking about the decision problems. The course is designed to introduce the fundamental techniques and methods of operations research. The related software will be utilized to aid in building and solving models. The topics to be covered: linear programming, what-if analysis, dual theory, transportation and assignment.

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生瞭解各種製造的方法和程序，工具機之基本功能。其內容包含有鑄造、精密鑄造、塑膠加工、熱加工、冷加工、工具機基本元件、金屬切削、工具機的操作、粉末加工及測量。
description.en:
This course is intended to provide a comprehensive study of the Modern manufacturing processes and machine tools .The course is designed principally to provide the following topics:
1. engineering of materials
2. forming of materials 
3. traditional casting processes
4. broaching and sawing
5. turning and boring
6. drilling and reaming
7. milling and grinding
8. machine tools 
9. nontraditional machining

notes: 四工二甲乙合開，非商管群學生必選

description.zh: 介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of database system.  The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file.  In addition, the retrieval, add, delete, modify, edit and sorting of data files are also provided.  Finally, the students can develop a DBMS for themselves.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。

In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 本課程講授家具工程製圖技術及相關知識，著重在家具工程製圖與一般工程製圖的主要差別，其能讓學生將所設計的家具產品以圖面表達其細部結構與工程要件。
description.en:
This is the lecture of furniture engineering drawing technique and related knowledge, It emphases on the main difference between furniture engineering drawing and normal engineering drawing. The aim is for students to present the
detailed construction and main parts of their furniture design product by drawing.

description.zh:
行銷是由物品的流通及製造者對消費者或使用者所提供之服務等商業
活動所構成的。包括產品、產銷地點、通路及價格等四個主要原理。
行銷研究是幫助經營者去發展及研究市場並研擬更好之行銷計劃，包
括四種主要活動：研究計劃、收集情報、分析及發表。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with knowledge of marketing, including product strategy, physical distribution, channel and pricing. Case study and discuss through activities (planning, investigation, analysis and presentation) that carry out strategic marketing are employed from time to time.

description.zh: 講授並整合產品設計之基本理論、方法及程序。藉設計題目之演練，以分組討論之方式，引導同學學習組織表達及分析思考之能力；並以個別指導之方式，引導同學磨練創意之思考及熟練之表達技巧。
description.en: This course intergral the theoretical principle methodology and the process of produces design Guide the design student to work on design projects through group discussion and individual practice with creative thinking and presentation technique.

notes: 產品組 (彭老師於設計503教室上課) 設計501(四)5678

description.zh: 介紹傳統以及特殊加工法、製造法、金屬、非金屬材料之製造加工。
description.en: In the design and manufacturing of a product is is essential that the machine as wellas the process be understood, Manufacturing requires tools and machines that can produce products economically as well as accurately. Economy depends to a large extent on the proper selection of a machine or process that will give a satisfactory finished porduct. This course serves as an introduction to various manufacturing, foundry, special casting, and special working process.

description.zh: 室內建築基本知識及配置實務，包含平面、空間、量體、周遭環境、空調、燥音、功能、採光、色彩、表面材料等觀點。
description.en: The Course is divided into five units : 1). The Nineteenth Century : The Industrial Revolution was the major influence on architectural history development. Structures of this period were marvels of engineering using materials like iron, plate glass, and reinforced concrete in new types of construction. 2). Foundation of Modernism (1890-1920) : In this period, the art community, including Cubism, Expressionism, De Stijl, Futurism and Constructivism, greatly influenced the form of building. 3).Modernism(1920-1970) : In this period, emphasises were placed on the "Less is More" , historicism and ornament were abandoned, the replacement were form and function, reason and abstraction. 4).Postmodernism (1965-1989) : Postmodernism architecture is characterized by the idea of "Less is Boring", and was inspired by Classical tradition and historical precedents. 5).Contemporary Pluralism : In the latter part of the twentieth century, an architect doesn't want to be associated with a movement, unl

description.zh: 本課程藉由家具相關設計競賽活動或產學合作計畫案，讓學生實際演練家具設計程序及創新方法。本課程同時配合家具材料、家具結構與實習、家具製圖、電腦輔助家具設計等課程，期能習得家具創新設計與產品工程的能力。
description.en: The course through furniture design contest or industry-academy cooperation project, let students practice the design procedure and creative methods. The course coordinate the other courses: furniture construction and practice, furniture drawing, computer aided furniture design etc, expect getting the capability of creativity design and product engineering.

description.zh: 課程講授家具結構之專業知識與應用技術，理論與實務並重。內容包括開發流程、產品工程、基本力學、木材特性、複合板特性、木材接合、機械扣件、框類家具結構特性、板類家具結構特性、殼類家具結構特性等。
description.en: This course is introducing the knowledge and technique of furniture construction, both theory and practicing. The contents include R&D procedure, product engineering, basic mechanics, characteristics of wood, characteristics of composite board,, wood joints, mechanical fasteners, characteristics of frame type furniture, characteristics of panel type furniture, characteristics of shell type furniture etc.

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

description.zh:
本課程為產品設計專案程序之理論與實務
設計與創造性思考，專案與程序，劇本法邏輯，目標澄清，設計研究與調查，構想展開與評估，細部改善，語意法，專案設計策略。
description.en: This course focuses on concept and methods on product design project. It includes: Design Logic, Scenario Planning, Expression, Legibility, Semantics, Problem Solving, Concept Generation Evolution, Technology and Market.

description.zh: 透過多類型之作業演練，分析及探討由視覺衍生之知覺性及感情效果於平面設計上之影響，開發一套可供工業設計運用的基本視覺設計原裡。
description.en: Through multiple creative design projects, analyzing and discussing visual cognition affect graphic design work, Develop a basic system of visual communication usage for industrial design.

description.zh: 以國外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 本課程講授參數式3D模型建模之技能，透過3D參數建模軟體將家具各零組件繪製，及組裝圖的繪製，目的在於培養學生具有數位化表達能力，以利於家具設計時造型之編修、工程檢討與設計管理。
description.en: The course is introducing the 3d modeling skill. Through learn the furniture part and assembly design drafting to develop the ability of digital design. It can take advantage of a Digital Prototyping workflow to design and build better furniture in less time.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us g

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh:
本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：
第一學年課程視為建築設計之基礎課題，從建築美學之觀點培養基本素養、建築模樣體驗、設計實作再造，達到建築設計基本知識之體態。並結合一年級橫向課程之實作、圖學、設計理論、全能住宅改造等課程，課程規劃以多元建構為主，其養成要點如下:
1. 美學再創造：基本美學素養養成，將感知中的聽覺、視覺、觸覺等與美學體驗再度結合，用思考轉換形式。奠定日後進入空間美學基礎。
2. 建築繪圖與表現技巧：建築相關圖學與識圖展現養成，體驗空間感受與空間掌握，美學與繪圖思考整合。
3. 空間構成與思維邏輯：將2D轉為3D，藉由點、線、面、體之基本元素，將環境觀察或是感知等邏輯分析，呈現空間的比例、尺度或透過實作技術等理論，重構思維進一步與環境共構將空間再塑。
4. 設計實務養成：為因應環境友善，與環境共存之議題如何運用在設計之中，探討行為模式、機能、線安排空間組織等等，將環境之感受能力，以空間再改造展現能力，由於重於綠材料之實作特色，因此實作養成之重要關鍵之一，需配合全能改造課程。達到創作性實務，可說是實驗性實作的特色課程。
5.材料與構築實驗：體驗材料之特性，將材料之特性發揮到極限。
description.en:
This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. 
The course as the fundamental of architectural design aims to foster basic knowledge from the perspective of architectural aesthetics, experience, and design execution. Combined with the lateral curriculum of construction, drawing, design theory, and housing renewal projects, the program built upon diversified exposures in 1. aesthetics, 2. architectural drawings and rendering techniques, 3. spatial constructs and logics, 4.  Professional training, 5.  materials and experiments, 6. communication and presentation.

Studio introduction to architect

description.zh: 待補充
description.en:
In this course student can understand the property of general material of building
and the principles of building construction, we stress those knowledge related with component composition, that student can used in their design work.

description.zh:
介紹建築計劃的基本精神，方法，及各種類型建築的建築計劃案例分析
一．建築計劃基本精神
１．建築與生活、生產的關係
２．建築計劃之定位
３．建築計劃之構成、內容
４．建築計劃學的發展過程
二．建築計劃的方法
１．需求的產生與界定
２．建築計劃的調查方法
３．建築計劃的分析方法
４．建築計劃的定量計劃（尺寸與規模計劃）
５．建築計劃的調查方法（空間、機能、集合與複合）
三．建築計劃案例分析
description.en: Introduce the basic philosophy & methods of architecture planning. Case studies ofdifferent building types. The topic include：1、the basic philosophy of architecture planningl	the relationship between planning and living、productionl	the scope of architecture planning l	the content of architecture planningl	the developing period of architecture planning2、the methods of architecture planningl	the happening of needs & its definitionl	the investigation methods of architecture planning l	the analysis methods of architecture planning l	the quantity planning of architecture planning （size & scale planning）l	space、function、accumulate & complex 3、case study of architecture planning

description.zh:
本課程主要教導學生認識建築物理環境之基本理論，包含光環境、溫熱環境、空氣環境、音環境等，做為學習建築環境控制系統與建築設備之基礎。本課程內容分為七大部分，包括(一)建築氣象學概論、(二)建築微氣候環境、(三)建築採光與照明、(四)建築傳熱與隔熱、(五)室內通風換氣、(六)濕氣與結露、(七) 隔音與吸音等課題。
本學期介紹物理環境基本學理外，同時輔以相關案例補充說明，幫助學生在建築設計中能關注到使用者舒適、健康需求，並使其建築設計符合節能的永續建築要求。
description.en:
In this course, students will learn about the fundamental theories of architecture physics which include luminous environment, thermal environment, air environment, and sound environment as an introduction to understanding Systems of Environment Control and Architectural Equipment. The course is divided into 7 sections, (1) Introduction to Architecture Meteorology, (2) Architecture Microclimate, (3) Natural Lighting and Illumination of architecture, (4) Thermal Conduction and Proofing of Architecture, (5) Indoor Air Change and Ventilation, (6) Humidity and Condensation, and  (7) Sound absorption and proofing.
  In this semester, other than introducing the fundamental theories, related case studies are also incorporated as additional support to help students to be attentive toward issues such as comfort and health in their architectural design class at the same time to encourage the utilization of such knowledge to create energy saving and sustainable architectural designs.

description.zh:
本課程整體目標為奠定學生建築表現法基礎能力，以期培育學生成為符合建築業界所需之人才。課程針對建築領域所涉及與表現技法有關的各面向進行實作訓練，包括手繪圖、建築圖在數位環境的後製、實體模型製作、數位模型與diagram製作、圖面管理與排版輸出、口說表達能力等。
課程內容有(1)創意繪圖表現之介紹與練習；(2)數位環境中建築圖後製軟體Photoshop的應用介紹與技法練習，包括：材質與影像的合成、光源與陰影的加入、背景與點景的拼貼、複合媒材與筆觸的模擬等；(3)各種實體模型材料的探索與實驗；(4)數位建模軟體的介紹與基本練習；(5)輔助性圖說(diagram)包括設計概念說明、設計流程說明、量體發展圖說、空間構成圖說、構造關係圖說、各式爆炸圖等說明性圖面的應用介紹與製作練習；(6)排版軟體InDesign的應用介紹與練習，包括檔案管理、排版原則到輸出製作的流程；(7)口說邏輯與表達能力的訓練。
description.en: This course is an introduction to architectural presentation focusing on the fields of architectural design, representation processes and visual techniques. Students are expected to be able to utilize both traditional media and digital software. A series of tutorials and individual practices will lead students to several techniques concerning idea representation and communication such as freehand drawing, model making, collage, digital modeling, diagramming, layout designing, oral expression and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要是在教導學生了解力學之概念與分析方法，使其具備學習結構學之基礎能力，其主要授課內容包括：1.力學之基本概念及平衡條件、2.構材之斷面性質如形心、重心、面積一次矩、慣性矩及其應用、3.結構構材承受軸向載重、扭力、彎矩之分析及設計應用、4.應力及應變之關係、5.梁之變形，柱之性質以及各種分析理論。
description.en: This course introduced the concept of mechanics and provided the principles of structural analysis, the course consists of(1)	Equations of equilibrium(2)	Frame Section Properties (3)	Shear and moment diagrams (4)	Relationships of stress and strainDeflection of beams and Column characteristics

description.zh: 本課程以建築設計的相關知識與操作手法之介紹為主，輔以大量的案例說明。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to methods of architectural design from aspects of both substantive knowledge and process skills. A large number of projects will be referred as examples.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh:
先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意
介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力，應變及變形，莫耳圓，壓力容器，樑，柱。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading condition equations, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh:
先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意
力、質量與加速度，質點運動學，質點動力學，功與能，衝量與動量，剛體運動，剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Relations of Forces、Masses and Acceleration, Kinematics of Particles, Dynamics of Particles, Work and Energy, Impulses and Momentum, Kinematics of Rigid Bodies, Dynamics of Systems of Rigid Bodies.

description.zh: 電之基本概念，直流基本電路，電場與磁場，電磁效應，交流之基本概念，交流基本電路，電機基本原理，變壓器，三相感應電動機，單向交流電動機，同步電機，直流電機之分類及特性，直流電機之控制，伺服電動機之分類及特性，電機之維護。
description.en: Introduction to Electricity, DC Circuit Analysis, Electric Field and Magnetic Field, Magnetic Effect, AC Circuit Analysis, Principles of electrical Machinery, Transformers, Three-phase Induction Motor, Single-phase Induction Motor, Synchronous Electric Machinery, DC Electric Machinery, Control of DC Motor, Maintenance of Electric Machinery.

description.zh: C、QBASIC、FORTRAN或LISP，區段架構（變數、輸入／輸出），迴圈（ for,while,do,while ），選擇敘述（ if-else敘述，switch敘述），函數（函數的資料傳遞，外部變數），陣列與字串（陣列中元素之表達，字串），指標（指標與陣列，雙重指標：指向指標的指標），結構、等位以及 ROMBIOS，檔案（標準I/O，記錄I/O，隨機存取），如何設計一個大程式（分開編譯，記憶體式）。
description.en: Computer Languages: C, QBASIC, FORTRAN or LISP (Compiler or Interpreter) Including such as Statements of Flow Control: (Sequence, Selectionand Iteration), Basic Data Type and Input/Ouput Statement Subprograms(Parameters Called by Value and Address), Array, String and pointerStruct, Enum, Union and File How to Design a Large Program (Project,Memory Mode, Library).

description.zh:
先修課程:微積分或負責教授同意
常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，拉普拉氏轉換，級數及傅立葉級數，線性代數及矩陣，積分定理。
description.en: Ordinary Differential Equations, Laplace Transforms, Power Series, Linear Algebra, Matrices.

description.zh: 化學是富挑戰性且具教學難度之科目，使這個複雜的學科讓學生易於接受化學教育家的挑戰，特別是基礎化學。嘗試推展關鍵的化學概念，並以觀察現象為主，再討論理論模式，並用以解釋所觀測的現象是本課程的重點。希望學生實踐"如同一個化學家的思考方式"來仔細觀察，而不是跳入公式或模型中。此外，舉例證明化學在現實生活中的重要性與最新的應用及發展並以簡易明瞭的方式呈現於授課內容。
description.en:
Chemistry is fascinating and important subject that is challenging to teach and even more challenging to learn. Marking this complex subject accessible to students without distortion is challenge of the chemical educator, especially at the introductory level.
In this lecture I try to develop key chemical concept in the same way to show the observations first and then discuss the models that have been constructed to explain the observed behavior. I hope students will practice "thinking like a chemist" by carefully studying the observation to see if they can follow the thought process, rather than just jumping head to the equation or model that will follow.
In addition, to demonstrate the importance of chemistry in real life, I have incorporated throughout the book a number of applications and recent advances in essay form.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 教授電腦工程繪圖基礎，包括立體三維空間的投影觀念、幾何學製圖方法，訓練繪製草圖、各種物件之三視圖；並能正確標註尺寸，公差與配合，使具備繪製各式管路、鋼架、氣油壓及機械設備之相關標準工程圖的能力。
description.en: Instructing the basis of computer engineering drawing, including the concepts of orthographic projection of 3D space and the methods of geometry graphics. Training the skills to raw sketch, various 3D views. Learning to mark dimensions, tolerance and fittings correctly. This lesson also demands students to able to be familiarized the drawings of steel structures, hydraulic and fluid systems, and related mechanical devices.

description.zh: (1)基本電路元件介紹; (2)基本電路理論回顧; (3)半導體特性介紹; (4)半導體二極體電路分析技巧; (5)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (6)其他特殊二極體:發光二極體,齊納二極體,…; (7)雙極接合面電晶體工作原理; (8)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (9)雙極接合面電晶體交流小信號電路分析; (10)場效電晶體之分類:接合面型,金氧半增強型,金氧半衰減型,金氧半垂直型,金氧半互補型; (11)場效電晶體工作原理; (12)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (13)場效電晶體交流小信號電路分析
description.en: (1) Introduction to basic circuit components; (2)The review of basic circuit theories; (3)Introduction to the characteristics of semiconductors; (4)Circuit analysis techniques for semiconductor PN diode; (5)The applications of PN diode: Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (6)Special diodes: Light emitting diode(LED), Zener diode, etc.; (7)The operation principles of bipolar junction transistor(BJT); (8)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (9)Small signal analysis for BJT circuits; (10)The classification of field effect transistor(FET): JFET, Enhancement-MOS, Depletion-MOS, VMOS, and CMOS; (11)The operation principles of FET; (12)DC bias circuits for FETs; (13)Small signal analysis for FET circuits

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：1.常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，2.拉譜拉斯轉換，3.特殊函數。
description.en: This course intends to introduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1.Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher order ODEs. 2. Laplace transform, 3. Special function.

description.zh: 網路拓樸理論及特立勤定理；節點與網路分析；迴路與切集分析；狀態變數法；自然頻率；網路函數；雙埠網路；計算機輔助分析（PSPICE）；傅氏分析；拉氏轉換。
description.en:
1. The power of single phase and poly- phase, and complex    frequency and power factor correction; the phasor    conception to the Damped sinusoidal forcing function.
2. The resonant of frequency response, quality factor and    the width of a resonance     response curve of half-power    frequencies.
3. Magnetically coupled circuits and Two-port networks.
4. Fourier Analysis and Laplace Transform Techniques.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us g

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

name.en: British and American Literatures and Cultures

description.zh: 本課程引導學生熟悉變遷中之英美文學作品典律，並探討其形成之歷史文化背景及隨變遷所產生之時代意義。課程中將討論與作品相關之社會、政治、文化、心理、哲學、理論等議題，使學生能瞭解欣賞選讀作品，並銳化其思辯能力及分析技巧。學生須於課前詳讀作品，並於課堂上參與討論。
description.en: This course is intended not only to familiarize students with the evolving canon of British and American literatures, but also to investigate its contextual historical and cultural meanings, past as well as present. It aims to sharpen students' critical thinking ability and analytical reading skills by engaging them to discuss social, political, cultural, psychological, philosophical, and theoretical issues that are relevant to their understanding and appreciation of the selected literary works. Students are required to peruse the assigned weekly readings and participate in class discussion.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的主題包含語音，句法，語意，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
description.en: This course covers the basic ideas on the following sub-topics: phonetics & phonology, syntax, semantics, psycholinguistics, sociolinguistics and language acquisition, serving as a stepping stone for further research on language learning (native or foreign), teaching or other language-related study.

description.zh: 本課程旨在引導學生閱讀英美短篇故事，探討其敘事技巧、情節、人物、觀點和語言等，如何在故事中建構意義，並著重故事所傳達的文化意涵。
description.en: This course will guide students to read short fiction written by British and American authors.  By reading a wide range of short stories, we will examine how such narrative techniques as plot, character, point of view and language construct meaning in stories.  We will also examine what these stories tell us about the cultures that produce them.

description.zh: 課程橫跨英國文學的歷史，由中世紀到現代， 選讀英國文學史中最經典、最耐讀、可讀性最高的作品。務求由社會背境、歷史脈絡、和哲學思潮各方面理解作品。目標除了對英國文學史，不同文類（詩、戲劇、小說）和文學技巧有較全面的認識外，更可以提升理解其他文學作品的能力。
description.en: This course offers a directed sampling of a range of literary texts across the history of British literature, from the medieval to the modern period. Canonical works of different literary genres (poetry, drama, novel) will be discussed in relation to the social, historical and philosophical backgrounds. Upon completion of the course, participants should have a basic understanding of the history of British literature, and be able to identify their corresponding styles and literary devices, social and religious issues, and philosophical thoughts.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎法語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic French abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the French language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎西班牙語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us g

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
description.en: The purpose of Statistics is to give students an introductory of statistical thinking, methods development and the assessment of credibility and value of inferences made from data.  A conceptual introduction to the field of statistics and its many applications with extensive coverage of data collection and analysis as needed to evaluate the reported results of statistical students and make a good decision will be included as well. The statistical software introduction will also be introduced in the class.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The marketing course is suitable to college student. The purpose is to find good method of product marketing, in order to pursuit good profit of enterprise. The course contents' goal makes student understand the idea of marketing, product design, product transportation, promotion and price setting. The related course includes: market segmentation, market organization, the behavior of buying, product development, retailing, whole-saling promotion, advertising and price setting process.

description.zh: 本課程藉由探討組織理論之內容，分析組織設計之相關因素，並討論當代組織最新的設計與發展趨勢，俾使同學結合組織設計之傳統及現代理論，利用個案討論增強理論之理解與活用，進而培養學生管理組織之能力。本課程包含下列四大要綱：第一部份：組織與組織理論基礎 ；第二部分：組織結構與設計；第三部分：網際網路環境下，當代與未來的組織設計趨勢；第四部份：組織理論個案探討。本課程藉由探討組織理論之內容，分析組織設計之相關因素，並討論當代組織最新的設計與發展趨勢，俾使同學結合組織設計之傳統及現代理論，利用個案討論增強理論之理解與活用，進而培養學生管理組織之能力。本課程包含下列四大要綱：第一部份：組織與組織理論基礎 ；第二部分：組織結構與設計；第三部分：網際網路環境下，當代與未來的組織設計趨勢；第四部份：組織理論個案探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to integrate the most resent thinking about organization design with classic and traditional ideas and theories. This course covers the following three major parts: Part 1: organization and organization theories Part 2: organization structure and design Part 3: new thinking of organization design in the Internet era, Part IV case study.

description.zh: 中文概述	在接洽商務時能以最基本的日文能力應用在名片交換、自我介紹或洽商時基本會話、禮儀及習俗等之應對。第一篇：商務必備 第一章：交換名片與自我介紹 第二章：電話應對實務 第三章：商務會話實務第二篇：模擬洽商 第一章：到日本訪問時的商務會話實務 第二章：在台與日商買主交涉商業實務第三篇：日本文化有趣篇
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental conversation, courtesies and customs by using the Japanese. In addition to understand the origins and significance of these business behaviors, the students will be requested to conduct a simulated practice, such as changing the business card and self-introduction, in the class to have a better realization.

description.zh: 本課程為財務會計領域之進階課程，針對已具初級會計學之學生深入講授財務會計之理論、觀念、方法及程序。本課程全面納入國際財務報導準則(IFRS)﹐內容包括：介紹財務報導觀念架構、主要財務報表編製、講解資產負債表中有關資產、負債、股東權益以及現金流量表與租賃會計等，修習本課程可使學生對IFRS有全面整體了解及運用之能力,亦有助於將來參加會計乙級、記帳士及公務人員高考等證照考試。
description.en: This curriculum enters the step curriculum for the financial accounting. Intermediate accounting requires ever increasing knowledge and refinement of skills. Our goal is to achieve the most educational effective blend of concepts and practice relation to the current intermediate accounting body of knowledge. This course strives to provide the material needed to understand this subject area using IFRS. It may also be helpful to participate in accountant the license test and the government workers examination.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉物件導向設計原理及C++進階程式設計技術，內容含：1. C++ 物件模型 2. 類別與物件3. 建構者與解構者 4. 繼承 5. 虛擬函式與多型 6. 運算子溢載 7. 例外處理 8. 泛型程式設計 9. 標準模板程式庫 10. 期末專題設計
description.en: To familiarize the student with an overview of the object-oriented programming (OOP) paradigm and advanced techniques of the C++ language. Topics include: 1. C++ Object Model 2. Classes and Objects 3. Constructors and Destructors 4. Inheritance 5. Virtual Functions and Polymorphism 6. Operator Overloading 7. Exceptions 8. Generic Programming 9. Standard Template Library 10. Term Project

description.zh: 本課程介紹ARM CPU 及以ARM CPU為核心之微算機系統。內容包含：ARM CPU介紹，ARM CPU指令集，SRAM、DRAM、及Flash Memory之介紹，時序圖之閱讀，記憶體及I/O解碼，串列I/O及並列I/O之介紹，計時及計數器之使用，震盪器介紹，A/D及D/A轉換，中斷之使用，及應用實例之介紹。
description.en: This course covers the following topics: introduction to ARM CPU, instruction set of ARM CPU, introduction to DRAM, SRAM and Flash memory, reading of timing diagrams, decoding of memory and I/O, parallel and serial ports, using timers and counters, oscillators, A/D and D/A converters, interrupts, and case study.

description.zh: 本課程在於介紹科學及工程系統中數項常用數學之原理及應用，內容涵蓋微分方程、差分方程及複變分析。授課內容大綱如下：1.一階微分方程式2.線性二階及高階微分方程式3.微分方程式之級數解4.差分方程5.複數及複變函數6.複數積分7.複冪級數8.餘數定理
description.en: This course aims to introduce students of science and engineering to some mathematics employed in their disciplines. Topics include differential equations, difference equations and complex analysis. The outline of this course is listed as follows.1.First Order Differential This course aims to introduce students of science and engineering to some mathematics employed in their disciplines. Topics include differential equations, difference equations and complex analysis. The outline of this course is listed as follows.1.First Order Differential Equations2.Second-Order and Higher Order Linear Differential Equations.3.Series Solutions of Differential Equations4.Difference Equations5.Complex Number and Complex Functions6.Complex Integration7.Complex Power Series8.	Residue Theorem

description.zh: 本課程介紹電路基本元件與電路之分析方法，內容包含： 1.基本電路元件：電壓源、電流源、電阻器、電容器、電感器 2.柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律，簡單電阻電路，節點分析與網目分析 3.電路學定理：重疊定理、戴維寧與諾頓定理 4.一階電路 5.二階電路 6.弦波穩態分析 7.頻率響應 8.雙埠電路
description.en: The course introduces the basic circuit elements and the methods for analyzing circuits. The topics include: 1.Basic circuit elements: voltage sources, current sources, resistors, capacitors, inductors 2.Kirchhoff voltage and current laws, simple resistive circuits, node analysis and mesh analysis 3.Circuits theorems: superposition principle, Thevenin and Norton theorems 4.First-order circuits 5.Second-order circuits 6.Sinusoidal steady-state analysis 7.Frequency responses 8.Two-port networks

notes: 四資二與四子二乙合開；電子系必修、資工系為選修

description.zh: 本課程在介紹數位多媒體的基本概念與使用技術. 課程內容包含: 1.數位多媒體概論 2.網路多媒體與資訊傳播 3.影像處理原理與方法 4.視訊剪輯原理與DV使用方法 5.網路串流媒體影音同步 6.電腦圖學與卡通動畫 7.多媒體影像資料庫 8.隨選服務與網路現場轉播 9.互動式多媒體標準MPEG-4, MPEG-7 10. 數位多媒體案例實作
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques of digital multimedia. The outline of this course includes: 1.Introduction to Digital Multimedia 2.Networked Multimedia and Information Communication 3.Principle and Methods of Image Processing 4.Principle of Video Editing and Usage of Digital Video Equipments 5.Network Streaming Media and Audio/Video Synchronization 6. Computer Graphics and Cartoon Animation 7.Multimedia Database 8.On-Demand Service and Network Live Broadcast 9.Interactive Multimedia Standard MPEG-4 and MPEG-7 10. Some Case Implementation in Digital Multimedia

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 了解電磁學之基本觀念與應用。（１） 電磁模型（２） 向量分析（３） 靜電場（４） 靜電問題解法（５） 靜電流（６） 靜磁場（７） 時變場與馬克斯威爾定理（８） 平面電磁波（９） 傳輸線理論與應用（１０） 波導及共腔共振器（１１） 天線反輻射原理
description.en: To make the students understand the basic concepts and applications of Electromafneties which includes : 1.Electromafnetic Model. 2.The Vector Analysis. 3.Static Electric Fields. 4.Electrostatic Problems`Solutions. 5.Steady Eletric Currents. 6.Steat Mafnetic Fields. 7.Time Varying Fields and Maxwells`Equations. 8.Plane Electromapnetic Waves. 9.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines. 10.Wavef uide and Carity Resonators. 11.Antenna and Radiation Theory.

description.zh: 克希荷夫定律(KCL, KVL)及綱目電流法、節點電位法及重疊定律、載維寧定律等之電路計算技巧應用；RLC電路之一階、二階電路之暫態自然響應及相量式之於弦波函數穩態分析。
description.en: Some useful tchniques of circuit analysis in mesh current method, nodal analysis, superposition principle and thevenin's theorems and so on; the first order and second order equation for natural response in RLC circuits and phasor concept to forced response in sinusoidal steady-state equation.

description.zh: 本課程包含: (1)一階常微分方程式，(2)高階常微分方程式，(3)常微分方程之冪級數解法，(4)邊界值問題，(5)拉普拉斯轉換
description.en: This course contains: (1)First-order ODEs,(2)Higher-order ODEs,(3)Series solutions of ODEs,(4)Boundary value problems,(5)Laplace Transform

notes: 80人以上教室，另星期三第9節為微分方程(一)輔導課。

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
