Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh: 台灣的歷史從無文字傳統的原住民起，到17世紀西班牙、荷蘭海上競逐開始，漢人隨之移墾台灣，成為這塊土地最主要的住民。本課程的內容將依時間先後，將荷蘭西班牙殖民時期、鄭氏王國、清代台灣、日治時期與國民政府時期重要歷史大事、人物等依據講義講解，內容有政治、宗教、文化、經濟、社會等各層面的重要事件、人物以及歷史發展。
description.en: The history of Taiwan originated from the aboriginal culture in which no written languages were included. In the 17th century when the Spanish and the Netherlands were competing for the maritime power, the Hans immigrated into the island and became the main resident. The course will be taught in the temporal order: colonial periods under the Spanish and the Netherlands, Zheng's Kingdom, Taiwan under the Qing Dynasty, Taiwan under the Japanese Domination and Taiwan under the Nationalist Government. All the significant events and important figures will be discussed in class--on politics, religion, culture, economy and social development.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，配合設計實務的操作，使學生能充分了解使用者介面設計的流程以及相關的應用，始其具有能進行使用者使用者介面實務製作的能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theory of user interface design, accompanying with design practice. This will allow students to understand the process of user interface design and related application, so as to be capable of practical interface design. The contents include conceptual model, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and design work.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 透過創造力理論建立與創造思考的策略與方法實例演練, 強化學生創意思考能力，讓學生有應用想像力的機會，以培養學生流暢、變通、獨創及精密的思考能力, 進而激發出無限創意潛能。
description.en: Through the establishment of creativity theories and the practices of the methods of creative thinking, students apply their imagination to problem solving. The aim of this course is to stimulating students' creativity by training their thinking modes to be fluent, flexible, original, and precise.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 在上學期開設，一學期，兩學分。斷限：始於日據時期，止於七十年代，以台灣白話文學之生發演進史程為主軸。範圍：涵蓋文字改革運動，第一次鄉土文學論戰，第二次鄉土文學論戰，  本土化文學思想研析、及作品選讀。要求：學期報告一份、期末考。
description.en:
Period: From the Japanese sovereighty to the 1980's; emphasizing the history of the vernacular literature. 
Topics: The movement of the language revolution; the first controversy of folk literature; the second controversy of folk literature; analysis of the literary localization movement and the study of selected works.
Requirements: One term paper and a final exam.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 著作權法係為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，所特別制定之法律。該法所稱著作包括：語文著作、音樂著作、戲劇、舞蹈著作、美術著作、攝影著作、圖形著作、視聽著作、錄音著作、建築著作、電腦程式著作等。著作權的保障內涵則包含因著作完成所生之著作人格權及著作財產權。本課程將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於著作權的瞭解。
description.en: Copyright Act  is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. "Works" of this act, include the following:1.Oral and literary works.2.Musical works.3.Dramatic and choreographic works.4.Artistic works.5.Photographic works.6.Pictorial and graphical works.7.Audiovisual works.8.Sound recordings.9.Architectural works.10.Computer programs. "Copyright" means the moral rights and economic rights subsisting in a completed work.The discussion in the course covers theory and examples，to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh:
一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。
二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。
三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 鴉片戰爭一役，滿清政權遭到慘敗，開啟了中國三千年未有之大變局。之後一連串的失敗，中國更是屢戰屢敗，割地、賠款之餘，也出讓國家的利權，不平等條約破壞了中國領土的完整與主權的獨立。此期間雖部分有識之士提倡洋務運動和維新變法，希滿清政府能即時奮發圖強，應付危機，無奈守舊派人士反對，且積弊已深，故改革的成績不如預期，以致革命的號角響起，滿清即隨之土崩瓦解。本課程主要是以近代的重大事件為主，分析發生的原因及其影響。課程也包含台灣史在內，讓同學們對生於斯長於斯的故鄉，有更深一層的認識和了解。
description.en: The complete defeat of Ching Dynasty in the Opium War initiates tremendous changes that have never been discovered in the three-thousand-year history of China. The subsequent military defeats after the War also lead to a series of arrogation of land, monetary reparations and even the yield of sovereignty. The unequalized treaties cause a great damage to the wholeness of the land of China and the national sovereignty. During the period, some of the pioneering statesmen work to advocate the westernized campaigns and to renew the old political systems in the hope that Ching administration could cope with whatever crises that might arise, but unfortunately, the reformation does not go as successfully as is expected due to the objection from the conservative circles. As the bugle of revolution vibrates, Ching Dynasty thus disintegrates soon. The course mainly discusses significant events, their causes and subsequent effects, the history of Taiwan also included so that the students would fur

description.zh: 唸科學哲學的一個重要原因是﹐藉此提供我們一個機會﹐在科學的架構之內探索一系列很根本的形上學﹑知識論問題。它們包括﹕外在世界的存在與性質﹑因果與必然性﹑合理的信念﹑真理、理論與證據之間的關係等等。而我們對這些問題所提供的答案﹐必須具備相當的精確度與嚴格性﹐並且﹐理想上﹐能有科學知識做為支持的證據。此外，科學是我們生活中不可或缺的一部份。因此﹐要做一個現代受過良好教育的公民﹐要能作出正確的抉擇﹐我們便需要具有科學哲學知識﹐從而了解科學是如何運作的﹐以及能夠對一些和我們個人利益乃至公共福祉相關的科學性議題進行反省。
description.en: One of the main reasons for studying philosophy of science is that within the context of science, a number of fundamental metaphysical and epistemological questions can be answered.  These include:  questions about the existence and nature of the external world, causation and necessity, rational belief, truth, the relations between theory and evidence, and so on.  Furthermore, for better or worse, science is a big and growing part of the modern world.  To be informed citizens and to make good decisions, we need to have knowledge of this subject, so that we can know how science works and to reflect upon scientific issues that concern personal interests and public welfare.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh:
植物與人類生活息息相關，人類選擇植物加以栽培生產，用來提供食、衣、行、及健康所需，而農耕的發達則與人類文化及社會的演變互相影響。本課程將由各種不同角度介紹，包括植物特性、栽培管理技術、自然環境、地理、人文、社會、政治、經濟等方面，與植物生產
的關係。主旨希望同學能了解人類與植物間相依相存的關係，並進一步關懷人類、植物、與自然環境之間的相處之道。
description.en: Plants supply major food for all kinds of living organisms.  This lecture is prepared to introduce the relationship between the crop plant and modern food  production.  The whole spectrum will be viewed from the aspect of the chacteristics of platns, the nature environment, science, human civilization, society, politics and economics, etc..  Hope students can concern and respect the mutuality between plants and human.

description.zh:
此課程提供理解媒體報導全球暖化相關議題必要的基本知識，主要內容包括以下重點：
一、氣候變化與全球暖化現況概述
二、地球溫室效應與主要溫室氣體簡介
三、氣候的人為暖化與自然變異
四、有關全球暖化熱門議題探討
description.en:
This is an introductory course to Global Warming. The purpose of the course is aimed to give some basic knowledge to college students for understanding those Global-Warming related issues that have been frequently covered by popular news media.
The contents of the course include:
1.Climate change and the recent warming trend of the earth.
2.Green house effects and green house gases.
3.Attribution of recent climate change.
4.Discussion on popular issues of global warming.

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

name.en: The Cultural History of Chinese Medicine

description.zh: 本課程結合考古發現、出土文物、傳世圖書及近人研究，討論中國這塊地域自有文字出現以來的醫療文化變遷。經由本課程學生可以瞭解傳統中國社的醫療知識和社會、文化與政治間的可能關係。
description.en: The contents of this course include archaeological discoveries, unearthed artifacts, written documents and recent literature, and focuses on the medical and cultural changes in Chinese history. Students who take this course will be able to comprehend the medical knowledge as well as the interrelations among social, cultural and political dimensions in traditional China.

description.zh: 哲學心理學(Philosophical Psychology)是以人的理智(intellect)或理性(reason)為基礎，對人的各個層面，所做的知性探討。準此，這門學科又被稱做人的哲學(Philosophy of Man)或哲學人類學(Philosophical Anthropology)。本課程將分成兩個階段來進行:首先，我們將回顧歷史上一些重要哲學家對此主題的洞見。藉著點讀如亞里斯多德(Aristotle)、笛卡兒(R.Descartes)、休姆(D.Hume)、康德(I.Kant)、與維根斯坦(L.Wittgenstein)等大哲經典之吉光片語，可以奠定我們對此學科之理論基礎。然後，我們將借重一些當代科學，如腦神經科學(Neuroscience)、心理學(Psychology)、神經生物學(Neurobiology)、和生理學(Physiology)等之研究，增進我們對人自身一些重要議題的認識。這些議題至少包括:心靈(Mind)、情緒(Emotion)、感官(Sensation)、直覺(Intuition)、創造力(Creativity)、身體(Body)、與臉孔(Face)等。我們還將播放與這些議題有關的科學影片，以豐富我門對人自身之瞭解。
description.en: Basing on human intellect or human reason, philosophical psychology is an intellectual endeavor that investigates some of the important aspect of human beings. Hence, the subject is also called philosophy of man or philosophical anthropology. This course will be divided into two stages as it proceeds. First, we shall review the insights provided by a few important philosophers such as Aristotle, Descartes, Hume, Kant, Wittgenstein, we thus are able to understand this subject on a solid footing. Then, by monitoring the major findings in some subjects such as neuroscience, psychology, neurobiology, and physiology, we thus enhance our understanding toward some key issues concerning human beings. These issues include at least: mind, emotions, creativity, body, and faces, and so on. We will also watch some related watch some scientific films to enrich our understanding toward we human beings.

description.zh: 本課程探討介紹勞工問題及勞資爭議的基本概念，同時輔以相關案例的檢討分析，以提升學生對於問題的了解，同時幫助學生學習職場溝通，以建立和諧及合作的勞資關係。
description.en: The main  purpose  of  the  course   is  to  discuss  about  problems  arising  from  labor  relation  and  how  to  settle  it  . This  course  focuses  on  the  introduction  to  the  fundamental  ideas  of  labor  problems  and  labor  disputes .  Many  relevant  cases  are  presented  in  class  for  further  discussion  and  analysis  .  It  also  helps  students  to  communicate  with  other  people  in  work  place  so  as  to  establish  a  harmonic  and  cooperative  industrial  relationship .

description.zh: 資訊法律課程將讓同學了解網路資訊社會中各層面的相關法律議題。本課程內容著重於各種網路法律問題，例如資訊安全、網路契約的訂定、網域名稱、數位化著作權、商標權，隱私權以及電腦犯罪種類及防治的介紹。另外，本課程也以個案方式，敘述電腦資訊的相關法律問題，並從中了解虛擬世界與現實世界的法律規範，同時測試自己是否具備足夠的資訊法律知識，能夠在快速變遷的資訊社會中立足與發展。
description.en: The course of Information Laws is designed for the students to familiarize such legal issues in most of the aspects available in the current world as information security, internet contracts, domain names, digital copy rights, trademark ownership, individual privacy and the genre & prevention in relation to computers. In addition, we discuss individual cases to further understand the nature of legal issues concerning computerized information. Hopefully, we learn the legal disciplines existent in the virtual and real worlds; besides, the students are supposed to equip themselves with sufficient legal knowledge so that they can survive and thus keep growing in the ever-changing information society.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh:
本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車、碳回收等；「節能科技」則包括節能住宅、變頻空調等主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。
教學目的：
綠色科技為21世紀最重要的科技，除了維繫人類在地球上的永續生存外，發展綠色科技更是對抗目前全球金融危機的唯一途徑。本課程希望透過介紹綠色科技，進而喚醒大家對環境的關懷與愛護，更重要的是透過介紹綠色科技的原理，讓更多年輕人瞭解綠色科技，期待綠色科技能在台灣真正技術生根。
description.en:
This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, carbon recapture, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.  
教學目的：
    Green technology is the most important technology in the 21st century. It does not only influence the human ever life on the earth, but is also the unique road against the present global financial crisis. This course wishes people to care for and love the earth by way of understanding the green technologies. Moreover, this course hope to let more young people

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

description.zh:
透過點子激發、設計思考、Hook Model 的學習、假設驗證的過程以及 Business Model Canvas 等方法，學會如何驗證與思索創業計畫，進而撰寫簡潔而有效的創業計畫書。
當今時代有許多創業發想，均花費許多時間在撰寫創業計劃書，然而最近的矽谷創業圈已經不再流行一本又一本的創業計劃書（Business Plan / Business Proposal），更重要的其實是如何透過假設的驗證、市場的調查（或理解），以及仔細的規劃設計一個有效的創業計畫，比創業計劃書的撰寫更重要。
如同奇點大學所教導 – 如果能改變十億人，那麼必能產生十億元的價值。反之，如果要能產生價值十億的「創業計劃書」，必要先能產生價值十億的「創業計畫」。「書/寫」乃是本門課程的附屬建物，實體建築乃有效「創業計畫」之生成、驗證是也乎。
description.en: A good business plan is build upon a good innovative idea and a good storytelling first; then it will also need certain reasonable structure that can be well understand and clearly present the business idea and its roll out plan. That’s the spirit of BP (Business Plan / Business Proposal). In this course, we will NOT focus on the representation of BP, but focus on the business idea/plan itself.

description.zh:
使同學具備良好的造形能力，對於今後從事各類型之設計、繪製圖表等均有幫助。教學內容包括筆法及明度練習，室內靜物寫生，室外樹木、建築物之寫生。
教學方法：先練習運用鉛筆，使其表現各種筆觸、輕重，再要求造形之準確度，達到形態和質感的表現正確，以及構圖有美感的能力。先由老師示範，而後同學練習
description.en:
Equip students with the ability of styling so that their designing and drawing ability can be improved. 
The teaching material used for this class includes stroke and chiaroscuro, drawing of still life, and nature painting outside. Teaching method: Practice how to use a pencil for the demonstrating various touches in light and heavy strokes.  Students shall learn how to perform  precise styling,  correct expression of formation and personality, and a beautiful configuration. The instructor will give a demonstration first and then students shall follow and learn.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh:
本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。
課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en:
This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.
The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

description.zh: 課程目的在以宏觀的視野，探索宇宙間生命的起源、演化與消失。課程內容：1.開天闢地－宇宙的誕生 2.神秘的黑洞 3.太空探險 I－神話與幻想時代 4. 太空探險II－科學研究與太空殖民時代 5.外星人存在嗎？ 6.從哈伯看宇宙 7.最美麗的行星－地球 8.克卜勒行星運動三大定律 9.彗星撞地球－宇宙中的災難 10.宇宙的盡頭。
description.en: Purpose: Exploration of the Universe with a micro-view on how it began, evolved and died. The content includes 1. The Big Bang 2.Mysterious black hole 3.Exploration of the Universe I -imagine and dream 4.Exploration of the Universe II - Scientific research and the space colonial times 5.Does E. T. exist？ 6.Watch the Universe from a Hobble telescope 7.The most beautiful planet-the earth 8.Kepler's law 9.Deep impact-the catastrophe in Universe 10.The end of the Universe

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生了解新創事業在智慧財產權與專利管理的基本知識，課程的教導將朝下列方向進行: (1) 新創事業智慧財產權的基本觀念與實務， (2) 專利資訊分析，(3) 專利演化與發展 ，(4) 創意產出，(5) 專利申請與保護 (6) 專利佈局 (7) 專利侵權鑑定 (8) 專利迴避設計 (9) 案例討論與分析。
description.en: This course teaches students Intellectual Property Rights and patent management for Entrepreneurship. The course includes topics as follows: (1) Basic knowledge and practices of Entrepreneurship Intellectual Property Rights; (2) The analysis of patent information; (3) The evolution and development for patent; (4) Innovative idea generation; (5) Application and protection of patent (6) Patent strategy (7) Patent violation，(8) Patent avoidance，(9) Cases study.

description.zh: 一般認為台灣民間宗教信仰源於中國民間宗教傳說，此說法亦無可厚非，不過台灣民間宗教信仰極重要的特色，已不再是神教文化承接的問題，而是其已轉為在地的以實體寺廟建築場所，作為當地政治社會文化中心所發展出的民間信仰。本課程在讓同學了解台灣地區有哪些歷史悠遠的廟宇主神、事蹟傳說，以及其所帶動的宗教組織和信仰風情。課程包括：1.台灣原住民的巫術與神靈信仰、2.台灣的?時與節慶，如過年與元宵、清明與端午、七夕與普渡、中秋、冬至與尾牙等；3.台灣的主要神明信仰，如媽祖、觀音、關聖帝君、玉皇大帝、玄天上帝、清水祖師、城隍爺、地藏王、福德正神、五府千歲及王船祭等；4.台灣的主要宗教團體如齋教、一貫道、理教、天理教、軒轅教、天帝教、台灣靈乩、符籙學會、儒教學會、亥子道教等。
description.en: "Taiwanese folk religion" involves many dimensions, and it is one the most important applicable knowledge to local education. However, students in elementary and junior high schools still lack of the knowledge in this field. Therefore, the arrangement of lecture, camp, and religious construction regarding to the learning of Taiwanese folk religion is desirable. Hopefully, through all the effort, students could acquire more knowledge about Taiwanese folk religion, and share their learning experience on their daily lives. The main goal of the course is not only to improve the situation that our students have insufficient knowledge about folk religion, but also to help them apply the knowledge on the internet frequently. In addition, we will help students gain more information in this field and improve their learning quality of Taiwanese folk religion in Taiwan. This course include four fields: 1.The various gods that people believe in Taiwan 2.The Taiwanese custom and daily habits 3.The

description.zh: 本課程主要在從人生內在活動面向使學生明瞭宗教與人生的關係。首先探究人生的意義與特性，次則經由對宗教哲學，比較宗教學與宗教現象學的瞭解，來分析人生的問題。內容特別強調文化對人生的影響，宗教乃是深層文化原則所繫，同時人生問題也能引發宗教的適應與發展等等。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to approach of " Action Immanent ", enabling students to realize the relation of religions and life. First, to study the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life. Second,through the understanding of "Philosophy of Religion "、" Comparative Religion " and "Phenomenology of Religion ", to analyze the problems of life. Emphasis is on culture and the influence of life, as religion is a foundation supporting culture where problems of life can stimulate the adaptation and development of religion.

name.en: The Development of Taiwan Technology History

description.zh: 台灣科技發展史將討論二十世紀前半（1900-1950）部份重要技術引入台灣後，造成的影響與社會變遷。依時間先後，先從農業技術的變革-綠色革命。其次研讀有關電力與水利的技術發展，然後進入工業化初期的台灣社會變遷，以及二次大戰期間軍需工業所引導出的初期重化工業。除了這些技術與產業變革之外，也將兼論及技術人物群像與職業教育的開端。
description.en: The main topics for class will discuss the important technology how to influence Taiwan society during 1900-1950. This class includes some important developments: Green revolution -it discuss about agriculture development; the technology development of electricity and water conservancy. In some topic we discuss about Taiwan society change in early days industrialization and chemical industry during world war II. Except those topics, technologists and the beginning of professional education in Taiwan will be introduced.

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會的民主觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課程擬從以下方向發展：政治生活與社會生活、政治文化與政治社會化、民粹主義與政治生活、公共意見與投票行為、民主憲政與人權保障、司法正義與司法革新、憲政運作與政治發展、政治秩序與政治發展、中國歷代政治得失等。
description.en: To study the time length of the political development of Taiwan and strength of the relationship between the traditional and modern period. Also the establishment of democracy in a multilateral society is to be studied. This class will study the basis of Taiwan society, and explore the following items: political and social life, political culture, socialization, populism. Also included are public opinion and voting orientation, constitution and human rights, the justice and reformation of judiciary, the operation of the constitution and political development, political order and development and an analysis of Chinese politial development.

description.zh: 本課程有系統概括性闡述動態地球科學的基本知識和理論。課程內容包括:地球簡介、地球在天體間的位置、地貌、全球熱量平衡、氣溫、水氣、降雨、風、氣旋、氣候、天氣、生態系統、水文、土壤、地球材料、岩石圈、板塊構造運動、火山、風化作用、塊體運動、淡水、流水地形、地形與岩石構造、風與浪地形、冰川地形、冰川期、土壤與生物等。
description.en: The contents of the course titled " INTRODUCTION TO EARTH SCIENCE " include : the earth; our place in the sun, geomorphology, the earth's global energy balance, air temperature, atmospheric moisture and precipitation, winds and global circulation, weather systems, global climates, global ecosystems, hydrology, global soils, earth materials, the lithosphere and plate tectonics, volcanic and tectonic landforms; weathering and mass erosion, fresh water of the continents; landforms made by running water, landforms and rock structure; landforms made by waves and wind; glacial landforms and the ice age; soil and biology.

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞篆竟藝術，認識我國歷代著名的篆竟家與優美的作品，由作品之中廣泛瞭解篆竟多樣化的美感表現與技法，並嘗試實現於創作。篆竟是我國特有的一種藝術形式，除了日常日信的實用功能之外，更普遍使用在書法或繪畫等藝術作品中。因此瞭解篆竟藝術之美，往往是面對其他藝術作品時所不可或缺的。篆竟創作必須在方寸微小的天地之內，專注構思，謹慎刻畫。如此苦心經營的體驗，同時也是十分可貴的精神陶冶。
description.en:
This course enlightens students on the art, the arlists and the masterworks of seal cutting. Form the appreciation of great works, students sharpen the understanding of the versatile beauty and skills exerted in seal cutting.
Seal cutting is a unique form of art in China. It is commonly applied in signets, and extensively connected with calligraphy and painting stampings and other artistic performance. Therefore, the understanding of seal cutting is supposed to be an inevitable way to unveil the curtain of Chinese art palace. Students are expected to work out the composition of seal cutting within centimeters;hence,their concentration and deliberation can be spontaneously molded.

description.zh: 從歷史之反省中，探索人類對未來之創造潛力。詮釋競爭與和諧，個人與國家，現實與理想之雙軌教學，期能栽培專業人力與宏觀之人材。啟發學生比較歸納、以古鑑今的思維能力，使之獲得客觀有用的歷史學識。
description.en: This course is designed to help students explore human creative potential for the future in the light of historical introspection.  This course is an interactive instruction on the following topics: competition vs. harmony, individual vs. nation, reality vs. ideality.  Emphasis will be placed on training students' logical reasoning in analysis, synthesis, comparison, induction, and deduction so that they can acquire useful historical knowledge in an objective way.  In so doing, we hope to cultivate perspective professional intellects.

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

description.zh: 勞動法包括與勞動市場、個別勞動關係及集體勞動關係等方面有關勞工工作權益的法律規範，透過本課程可以學習正確的勞動法律觀念和知識，同時培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，來保障並維護自己或他人的職場權益。
description.en: The legal specialty called Labor Law can be define as “the legal regulation of the labor market , individual labor relations and collective employer-employee relations. “labor market” pertains to market in which employers and workers exchange labor . Through this course , students can not only get correct concepts of " Labor Law " , but learn to protect their / others' rights in work place.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹世界上最新的光電科技發展及在台灣的相關光電產業。時間上規劃以第一小時介紹基本光電理論，第二小時介紹應用技術與實例。課程內容包括：1.雷射光與原理與應用， 2.雷射光與精密量測， 3.雷射光與機械人， 4.光電技術與半導體製造， 5.光資訊與光儲存， 6.光纖通訊系統， 7.紅外系統， 8.紫外線系統， 9. 雷射醫學應用， 10雷射光與國防， 11.光學設計與光學設計軟體， 12 光電科技與未來。
description.en: The course gives the outlook of the technology of Opto-electronics and the industry of Opto-electronics in Taiwan. The contents of this course are constructed as following：1. The principles and applications of Laser, 2. Laser and precise measurements, 3. Laser and robot, 4. Opto-electronics technology and semiconductor magnification, 5. Optical information and Optical storage 6. Optical fiber communication, 7. Infrared system, 8. Ultraviolet system, 9. Medical applications of laser, 10. Laser and defense 11. Optical design and software. 12. Opto-electronics and future.

description.zh: 人類從尚未有文字的歷史以來，就有各種不同規模的戰爭，戰爭很吊詭的以你死或我亡，相互毀滅之態勢，爭奪「活著」的條件。古今中外，爆發戰爭的因素或為爭奪領土、權位、或為族群之戰、為意識形態之戰、或為物質資源之爭奪。在視覺影像發達的今日社會，有關戰爭的歷史影像的紀錄片與劇情片數量龐大、並有許多可觀之處。本課程將利用這些描寫戰爭影像資料，帶領同學瞭解相關戰爭與戰役爆發的歷史及其經過。
description.en: Throughout human history, even prior to written record, various types of warfare and scales of battles have existed for various purposes of domination or survival by all means of cruelty and destruction. The arousal of violent conflicts might be an attempt at fighting for territorial dominion or material resources economically or altering another species ideologically. In today's modern societies, bountiful documentaries and films concerning historical warfare have been accumulated. This course will aim at giving students a broad understanding and profound knowledge of the causes, process, and effects of significant warfare in human history with the aid of visual images in different media.

description.zh:
中國的崛起正在改變全球的政治、經濟和文化，而台灣與港澳都是已然成型的大中華經濟圈成員，吾人必須要趁早了解中國市場崛起的原因，並開始作好準備。
 
本課程帶領學生深入瞭解中國崛起的背景、所代表的意義、以及如何去面對隨之而來的新挑戰。課程中並將描繪出世界的未來走向、美國霸權的逐日衰退、和各種產業即將面臨的威脅/挑戰/機遇。
 
中國已經成為世界最大的經濟體，未來台灣的企業、經濟前景、甚至個人生活都會感受到巨大的衝擊。中國的經濟成長何以會影響到所有的全球性產業和消費者，並分析許多工作即將面臨的威脅。
 
本課程由總體宏觀角度出發，逐步進入細部剖析，期末再以全球觀點回顧大中華經濟圈的發展，並對未來趨勢提出分析。
description.en:
This is an introductory level course on the rise of China as a major power and the emergence of the Greater China Economic Circle.
 
The rise of China is changing the global politics, economy and culture. Taiwan, as a member of GCEC, needs to understand the rise of China market in order to prepare for the future.
 
This course will show you the background and significance of China’s rising power and how to face the following challenges. Also, you will see the trends of the world, the decline of American hegemony and the challenges of different industry. 
 
China has already become the largest economy in the world. Taiwan, as a neighbor of China, will face great impact on aspects such as business, economic prospective and personal life. 
 
Through intensive reading and in-class discussion, the students are expected to gain an in-depth understanding of the developmental causes, path, and trajectory of the GCEC.
 
Both positive and negative factors will be critically examined in the assi

name.zh: 投資決策方法與交易技巧

description.zh:
本堂課邀請大富資訊各領域投資達人，從總經訊息剖析、產業趨勢分析、財務及商業分析投資選股、期權衍生性商品投資策略及套利避險實戰技巧，為台北科技大學學生分享其業界多年的寶貴心得。
財富自由是每個人所企求的，如何於在學期間培養好的投資理財觀念及交易技巧，一方面可降低未來步入職涯後財富大幅縮水的風險，另一方面或許可成為步入職場的利器，甚至可能是邁向財富自由的另一助力。
description.en:
This class is going to invite investment experts from FORTEK COMPUTER CO  to teach the students by sharing their practical experience in the finance industry. The contents include macroeconomic information analysis, industry trend analysis, financial statements analysis, investment strategies of futures and warrants, as well as experience sharing of trading techniques. 
Everybody wants to achieve financial independence; therefore it is important to have the right concept of investments and trading techniques. The purpose of this course is, on the one hand, help students reduce the risk of financial loss due to lack of financial knowledge. On the other hand, for those students who are interested in financial industry, this course offers practical training and may help students to find good financial-related jobs in the future. Also, it may help students to achieve the goal of financial independence.

notes: 經管三、經管所與最後一哩合開，限30人

name.zh: 創業講座-網路創業成功術

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor? There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

notes: ABC節，6週, 經管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 課程目標為培養學生探索實體與虛擬空間結合互動設計之各種可能性；並著重以虛擬空間體驗、虛擬空間創意發想、虛擬空間建構技術、虛擬空間介面理論與設計、模擬與評估。分階段促使學生探索虛擬空間設計之發展及應用，後續可往數位學習與數位遊戲等相關數位內容設計領域發展。
description.en: Curriculum objective is to promote students to explore the possibilities of interaction design for incorporating of physical space and virtual reality (VR). This study focuses on creative development of VR spatial experiences, VR space concepts, VR model techniques, VR interface theory and design, simulation and evaluation of VR interface. Students on phased, will explore the developments and applications of VR spatial  design, that allow them further studies on digital learning and digital game, fields related to the Digital Content Development.

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對口碑行銷相關議題有更深入的瞭解，包括 1.口碑的定義、 2.口碑廣告、 3.正負面口碑、 4.口碑與網路行銷、 5.口碑與市場導向、 6.口碑與品牌、 7.口碑與行銷策略等、 8. 社會互動、 9.及學生有興趣研究的口碑與行銷主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding word of mouth marketing. Topics are as follows: 1. Definition of word of mouth, 2. Word of mouth advertising, 3. Positive and negative word of mouth, 4. Word of Mouth and Internet Marketing, 5. Word of mouth and Market Orientation, 6. Word of mouth and Brand Management, 7. Word of mouth and Marketing Strategy, 8. Social Interactions, 9. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

name.en: Statistical Data Analysis Using Computer Software

description.zh: 訓練學生應用統計套裝軟體進行資料整理、陳列、分析、解釋及統計推論，以建立學生使用統計套裝軟體進行統計資料分析之能力。課程主題包括敘述統計之圖表製作、假設檢定、信賴區間、變異數分析和迴歸模型。學期末，學生應能以標準統計分析程序，分析商業資料，並根據統計分析之結果，建議可行之企業決策。
description.en:
This course reviews and expands upon core topics in probability and
statistics through the study and practice of data analysis. Topics
include numerical and graphical summaries of data, hypothesis testing,
confidence intervals, analysis of variance, and regression. Upon
completion of this course, students should be able to think critically
about data and apply standard statistical inference procedures to draw
conclusions from such analysis.

description.zh: 幫助同學了解投資的理論與實務發展,訓練分析能力與培養正確投資觀念：投資學基礎、固定收益證券、權益證券、投資組合分析與管理、衍生性金融商品與風險管理
description.en: To introduce the developments of investment theories and practice to the students and try to enhance their analysis ability. ＊concepts of investment＊fixed-income securities＊equity securities＊portfolio theory and analysis＊financial derivatives and risk management

description.zh: 本課程主要是涵括歷史與文物兩個領域，結合歷史研究及文物、圖像分析之基本素養，讓歷史與文物密切配合，相輔相成，既深化歷史研究，也增進學生對文物認識的深度與廣度，再造文物的生命力。課程中並安排學生至文物典藏單位參觀，以增添學生對文物的鑑賞力，期使理論與實際相結合。
description.en: This course mainly covers topics of two fields: history and cultural relics. The study of history is combined with the fundamental ability to analyze cultural relics and images. As the two fields are merged, they benefit each other-deepening the study of history as well as broadening the capabilities of further knowing and appreciating cultural relics-thus piling up more vitality. Also included in the course syllabus are trips to museums and spots of cultural relics in the hope that students will develop better ability to appreciate culture-thus merging the academic theories and the reality.

description.zh:
生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。
這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en:
Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. 
This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

notes: 四子四甲乙與電子所合開

name.zh: 法國文化資產與紙設計創新研發
name.en: French Cultural Heritage and R&D of Innovative Paper Art & Design

description.zh:
法國文化資產理念先進，文化與紙設計為全球設計人士取經之地。本課程的設計背景起源於希望結合設計人才、文化資產與藝術的學者、學生與臺灣埔里本地紙業之能源，達成跨領域教學，提升學生的藝術文化底蘊，活化並促進紙設計研發能力，豐富創新本校通識教育課程、促進臺灣紙業與學生的設計水平。
探究法國的文化資產，也是進而了解法國設計如何從文化中萃取精華再創作。讓同學由法國的案例，除了增進國際視野以外，進而思考本土及異國文化與紙設計的關係，為創意主題發想。
description.en:
France has magnetized global design talents with its exemplary avant-garde ideas, one of them being paper arts and crafts. This interdisciplinary course aims to incorporate different elements — designers, scholars, students, and Puli’s (埔里) paper industry — to enrich learners’ cultural literacy and R&D skills, further motivating student designers and Taiwan’s paper industry to advance their creativity. 
By inquiring into the French cultural heritage, students are expected to not only cultivate diversified global views, but, specifically, learn how French designers transform existing cultural elements into cutting-edge ideas as regards paper arts and crafts.

name.zh: 博物館創新導覽研究與研發
name.en: R&D of Museum Tour Guide Service

description.zh:
當代各大博物館創新導覽方式為有意從事文化工作之學生須研習的課題。博物館知識似乎已不在侷限於本科系學生才能勝任與報考，未來熟捻多媒體設計的學生也都將是博物館設計與導覽的生力軍。

博物館是文化的再現、創作的底蘊，當代博物館隨著科技的進步，已敲敲地掀起導覽革命。博物館文物工作者與空間設計者嘗試以最新穎的互動媒體為21世紀文物導覽寫下創新又創意的一頁。 

本課程的設計背景起源於希望結合二位曾在法國與英國深研博物館學、與互動暨視覺傳達創新設計的學者，將其所學進行跨領域結合與教學，提升學生的專業博物館知識，增進文化素養，活化並促進設計研發能力。
description.en:
Students setting their sights on cultural work must also familiarize themselves with the innovative guide-service ideas in contemporary museums, whose window seems open to not only students in museum studies, but also those in multimedia arts. 

A museum is where culture revives and creativity thrives. With the progress of technology, today’s museums have revolutionized their ways of guide service — a collaboration between museum professionals, space designers, and the latest interactive media.

This course capitalizes on interdisciplinary teaching approaches, and is guided by two scholars, one receiving her Ph.D. in museum studies in France and the other in visual communication design in the UK, so as to enrich learners’ knowledge of museum studies, cultural literacy, and R&D skills.

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course focuses on three major areas: 1.The environment of global markets and cross-cultural comparison.2.Assessment of global market opportunities and threats.3.Development and implementation of global marketing strategies.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下： 1、被動IC元件的特性 、2、低雜訊放大器之設計 3、MOS元件介紹 4、混波器 5、被動RLC網路 6、射頻功率放大器 7、分散式系統 8、回授系統 9、史密斯圖形及S參數 10、鎖相迴路 11、振盪器與合成器 12、射頻放大器之設計 13、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are 1, features passive IC components, 2, the design of low noise amplifier 3, MOS element introduced 4, mixer 5, passive RLC network 6, the RF power amplifier 7, 8 decentralized systems, feedback systems 9, Smith graphics and S parameters 10, 11 phase-locked loop oscillator and synthesizer 12, the RF amplifier 13 of the design, noise analysis

notes: 四子三四甲乙與電子所合開

description.zh: 本課程目的在引介學生認識特殊活動/節慶的規劃及管理，重點放在藝術文化、常民節慶之活動設計、籌備與管理。從創意、組織、資源的引入，行銷；活動設計及管理；觀眾及參與者研究；行銷、營收及作業管理；活動與所在地點城鄉的動能；行銷資訊的取得及營收的來源規劃。
description.en: This course offers an introduction to the researching, planning, coordinating, marketing, management and evaluation of special events. The course content will explore the theories and practices relevant to successful event planning for host community residents and tourists.

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

description.zh:
1.通訊工程簡介
2.調幅與調頻
3.傳輸與接收系統
4.衛星通訊簡介
5.數據通訊簡介
6.光纖通訊簡介
7.電話系統簡介
8.行動通訊簡介
description.en:
1.Introductions
2.Amplitude and Frequency Modulations
3.Radio Transmitters and Receivers
4.Introduction to Satellite Communications
5.Introduction to Data Communications
6.Introduction to Fiber-Optic Communications
7.Introduction to Telephone System
8.Introduction to Cellular System

name.en: Introduction and Laboratory of GMP for biotech products

description.zh: 新興生技產品的生產製造過程，絕大部分都受到不同的GMP規範，而這些GMP規範又有別於機械，電子，化工產品的GMP規範，這也是台灣生技廠的業者迫切希望學校能教授的專業課目之一。由於生技產品GMP是跟著個別產品量身訂做的，因此本課程將選定一產品，然後依序從GMP法規的概述與要求，生技GMP品質系統，標準製造流程的建立，生產流程與GMP文件之建構，到最後的實習操作與實地GMP廠查核。
description.en: Most of the newly emerged biotech products must follow their GMP guidance, which is different from the GMP in mechanical, electronic, and chemical engineering products. According to the GMP guidance is depend on the biotechnical products, this course will teach and train students the following topics: the general introduction and the requests of GMP guidance, the system of quality requirement, the establishment of standard operation protocol, the establishment of documents and how to fill in it, and the practical training and the factory auditing.

notes: 四化四甲乙丙 和 最後一哩合開 (有2場參訪)

name.zh: 品牌領導公司整合型產品開發
name.en: Branded Company's Integrated Product Development: Advantech IPD

description.zh:
課程藉由研華公司的實務經驗，來協助同學了解業界實際的產品開發流程與公司運作實務，課程內容將包括市場定位、市場分析、產品規劃、產品設計、專案進行、製造、行銷、銷售、客戶服務等。
本課程將提供同學對於產品開發過程與產品生命週期的全盤學習過程，同學亦可藉此了解一個跨國企業的實際運作情形。
授課內容並搭配實案例的分享與專案演練，來引導學生結合學術理論基礎及業界實務操作，以協助同學未來於職場工作無縫銜接。
description.en: This lecture will try to help students learn more about technology product development and actual enterprise operating processes through Advantech's vast industrial experience which includes market research & analysis, product planning & design, manufacturing, and customer services. From this lecture students will not only get a better understanding of how a global enterprise operates, but also gain a clearer idea of how a newly developed product is developed by looking at its product life cycle. Practical cases will also be shared so as to describe and compare the methodology with the real experience. Through a better understanding of a global enterprise's operation, it is hoped this knowledge will enlighten participants and speed up their progress in their future career path.

notes: 電資學院各系所,機械系,車輛系和最後一哩合開，限30人

name.zh: 品牌領導公司整合型產品開發
name.en: Integrated Product Development of Branded Companies

description.zh: 藉由知名企業的實務經驗，協助同學了解業界實際的產品開發流程與公司運作實務，內容將包括市場定位、市場分析、產品規劃、產品設計、專案進行、製造、行銷、銷售、客戶服務等。本課程將提供同學對於產品開發過程與產品生命週期的全盤學習過程，同學亦可藉此了解一個跨國企業的實際運作情形。授課內容並搭配實案例的分享與專案演練，來引導學生結合學術理論基礎及業界實務操作，以協助同學未來於職場工作無縫銜接。
description.en:
This lecture introduces practical cases of branded companies, including market research & analysis, product plan & design, manufacture, and customer services. This class not only presents a global view of technical development, but also shares industrial experience from actual enterprises.
This work investigates a life cycle of new products which is under development, and compares the theoretical methodology with the real experience. This knowledge may enlighten participants and speed up their progress in their future career path.

notes: 電資學院各系所,機械系,車輛系和最後一哩合開，限30人

name.zh: 品牌領導公司整合型產品開發

description.zh: 課程藉由公司的實務經驗，來協助同學了解業界實際的產品開發流程與公司運作實務，課程內容將包括市場定位、市場分析、產品規劃、產品設計、專案進行、製造、行銷、銷售、客戶服務等。本課程將提供同學對於產品開發過程與產品生命週期的全盤學習過程，同學亦可藉此了解一個跨國企業的實際運作情形。授課內容並搭配實案例的分享與專案演練，來引導學生結合學術理論基礎及業界實務操作，以協助同學未來於職場工作無縫銜接。
description.en: This lecture will try to help students learn more about technology product development and actual enterprise operating processes through Advantech's vast industrial experience which includes market research & analysis, product planning & design, manufacturing, and customer services. From this lecture students will not only get a better understanding of how a global enterprise operates, but also gain a clearer idea of how a newly developed product is developed by looking at its product life cycle. Practical cases will also be shared so as to describe and compare the methodology with the real experience. Through a better understanding of a global enterprise's operation, it is hoped this knowledge will enlighten participants and speed up their progress in their future career path.

notes: 電資學院各系所,機械系,車輛系和最後一哩合開，限30人

description.zh:
透過分析創新成功之實際個案，讓修課同學了解創新的本質。課程中將介紹不同類型的創新個案，包括：技術創新、產品創新、服務創新與管理創新。本課程也擬搭配邀請成功之創業顧問與談，提供實務經驗，分享創業者該有的認知以及創業的重要理念，當然也包括分享他們在邀創業過程中所面臨的各類挑戰。
創業是每個人都曾經懷抱過的夢想，透過創新成功之個案的分析，可以了解到個案公司是如何有步驟的循序漸進。針對每個個案，我們要求每位同學於課前完成個案的閱讀，並於上課前交出本次課程的課前預習心得。我們希望每位參與的同學都能在討論時充分表達意見，遇有不清楚或不同意見時能夠勇於提出他們的看法。本課程擬營造出一種研究的環境，讓學生可以針對個案盡其所能清楚的提出建議並來說服同儕。
description.en:
The course enable participant to realize the essential features of innovation via cases study. Various types of innovation cases are included, such as: technology innovation, service innovation and management innovation. We also plan to invites some successful constants to give participants talk and share their experiences, including the challenge and their resolving process.
The real case study enables participants to understand the entrepreneurship and the steps to start a business. The participants are required to complete the case reading and a preview report is required in advance the class. We hope that every participant can propose their opinion and persuade others colleges of their viewpoints.

description.zh: 民主政治為法治政治，凡政府各項施政均需有法令依據。行政法，乃是國家各行政機關所適用之各種法令規章之總稱，其內容含蓋國家行政機關之組織、職權、作用、程序及爭訟等事項之法規，範圍至為廣泛，且與人民之權利、義務息息相關。本課程將以系統化、生動化，並輔以實例之方式講授，以啟發同學學習興趣。同學修習本課程，除可增進法治知能與素養外，並可對日常生活之權益維護有重大裨益。
description.en: Democracy is regarded as rule by law nowadays. All official policies that are implemented by government must be based on law. Administrative law is a general term of all kinds of regulations and laws that are suitable for administrative organizations. The content includes of administrative organization in this country. The course serves as extensive rules that are related to people is rights and obligations. The principle emphasis of the course is on the systematic instruction with specific examples tc enlighten students learning interest, furthermore not only promoting knowledge and professional training in law but also effective in daily life.

name.en: Introduction to the Constitutional Systems in Mainland China

description.zh: 兩岸關係向來牽動台灣的定位與發展，兩岸立國以來不同的憲政體制更是影響兩岸發展的關鍵。本課程首先說明兩岸憲政體制的基礎，並以簡略的歷史回顧，基本人權，政府體制與國家政策等議題研究兩岸發展概況，增進同學對兩岸的了解與關心。
description.en: The mutual relationship across Taiwan Strait has played a keynote role in deciding what the future position of Taiwan will be and what way Taiwan will develop onto. The totally different constitutional systems in the two sides, moreover, have exerted the greatest impact on the future political development. This course discusses some basic foundations which lead to the different constitutional systems across the strait. With a brief retrospect of the history, an introduction of the importance of human rights, a comparison between the governmental organizations and national policies, this course will prove to be of great help to the students in understanding the mutual relationship between Mainland China and Taiwan.

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解衍生性金融市場的運作，如何利用，及其定價模式。內容包括選擇權市場機制的介紹、股票選擇權的特性及其交易策略、Black-Sholes模型、及風險值的討論等。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand how the derivatives markets work, how they can be used, and what determines the price. The course includes the following topics: the options market and its mechanics, properties of the stock options, the trading strategies, the Black-Sholes Model, and the Value at Risk.

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 以國外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體材料、二極體、電晶體的原理、邏輯IC、記憶體IC。如物理沈積(PVD)、化學沈積(CVD)、高溫處理、微影、蝕刻及其相關設備介紹、廠物、維修、管理及工安等。IC封裝及測試。
description.en:
Introduction to semiconductor material, diode, transistor, logic IC and memory IC, etc. description of the operation principles technology and related facilities about semiconductor fabrication processes, such as Physical 
vapor deposition (PVD), chemical vapor deposition (CVD), doping , oxidation , heat process, lithography , and etching etc., discussion of utilities, maintenance, management and industrial safety in the factory. Discussion of IC packaging and testing.

description.zh:
先修課程：3001051或負責教授同意。
本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

notes: 1. 限四機二甲選課， 不開放外班選課。 2. 限45人

description.zh:
本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。
課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en:
This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.
The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh:
法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。
有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

notes: 法治向度，限外籍生修讀

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師陳建宏,國立海大,人社院大樓BOH201,博雅選修文化

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。

Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師陳偉誠,醫大美學教室,博雅選修文化

Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師陳瑞玲,醫大2103教室,博雅選修文化

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師王俊昌,海大人社院大樓BOH401,博雅選修歷史

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師黃麗生,海大人社院大樓BOH403,博雅選修歷史

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師林佳靜,醫大2202教室,博雅選修社哲/哲

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師辛法春,北大三峽校區人文學院2F02,博雅選修文化

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師王冠生,北大三峽校區法學院1F06,博雅選修社哲/哲

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 上2~4節,教師李克寰,北大公學院1F04,社哲/社,社哲/哲

description.zh: 本課程為財務會計領域之進階課程，針對已具初級會計學之學生深入講授財務會計之理論、觀念、方法及程序。本課程全面納入國際財務報導準則(IFRS)，內容包括：介紹財務報導觀念架構、主要財務報表編製、講解資產負債表中有關資產、負債、股東權益以及現金流量表與租賃會計等，修習本課程可使學生對IFRS有全面整體了解及運用之能力。亦有助於將來參加會計乙級、記帳士及公務人員高考等證照考試。
description.en: This course is an advanced course for financial accounting. It is to teach the financial accounting theory, concept, method and procedure for students with some basic accounting knowledge. The course covers all the materials to understand financial accounting based on IFRS. The course will help students for preparing advanced license examinations for accounting.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

notes: 外師授課；以多益550分為目標

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過流行文化的閱讀與討論，厚植英語文實力，並深入了解英美當代社會文化現象。課程選材涵蓋通俗文學、電影、音樂、體育、電視、網路等各種流行文化議題，著重修辭分析，文本摘要，以及批判式閱讀技巧的訓練，期能以多元互動的方式深化英語文能力。
description.en: This course aims to enhance students' competence in English through reading popularculture. The reading will cover a wide variety of "texts" in popular literature, film, music, sports, television and on the Net.  Special emphasis will be put on rhetoric analysis, text summarization, and critical comprehension skills such as identifying themain ideas and supporting details, recognizing context clues, drawing inferences and making critical judgments

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students into the world of modern English in a wide range of writing styles and subject matters.  It intends to build up confidence and competence of students who are interested in reading a variety of topics in the newspapers and magazines as well as other media. The first focus is to enrich vocabulary tank by learning key words in realms like business, economic, politics, entertainment, art; the second is to help master the writing skills and styles in journalism; the last is to enhance listening ability via broadcasting materials on audio/video channels like ICRT and CNN.

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
description.en: This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes, proposals, meeting minutes). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調設計專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service design students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.
