description.zh: 大稻埕文創社區經營結合歷史、建築、文化、音樂、茶道、祭典與近代社會運動、歷史遺跡，組合成豐富的大稻埕文化，藉由對此社區活動的認識，結合現代文創元素，讓學子對台北的古遺跡有更深刻的認識，並打造「大稻埕」成為歷史街區活化的國際品牌，期盼在提升台灣學子的「就業即戰力」與「國際移動力」的同時，也成為當今我國文化外交戰略的重要環節。
description.en: The community management of Dadaocheng creative zone combines her own history, architecture, culture, music, tea ceremony, ceremonies and modern social movements, historical relics into a rich specific Dadaocheng culture, through propagating her community activities combined with modern creative elements.  We expect our students to improve their " employment agility" and "international mobility", by enabling them to have a deeper understanding of specific Dadaocheng culture. And then, Dadaocheng being an international brand is an important part of Taiwanese cultural diplomacy strategy.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

notes: 四化四甲乙丙、化工所與化工所在職專班合開

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用暑假至機械相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative mechanical engineering company during summer vocation, practice and learn the real operation of the mechanical engineering related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

notes: 機械系－第二次校外實習

description.zh: 本課程將簡介醫學基礎與臨床知識，並對目前臨床使用之生醫材料作廣泛的介紹，與現今生物科技相結合，激發學生對於基礎研究及臨床科學的創意與思考。涵蓋科別將以牙科、骨科及整型外科為主。
description.en: This course will introduce basic medical and clinical knowledge. Those biomaterials that have been clinically applied will be focused. The aim is to inspire students' innovation and thinking about clinical science, through combining concepts of biotechnology with biomedical knowledge. Dentistry and orthopedics will be the major departments summarized.

notes: 四化四甲乙丙、化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: he main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer breakor other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生參與社會或學校等職場服務體驗，拓展學習領域、培育勤勞品格、落實誠樸精勤精神，同時藉由參與行動中接觸各種實務職場經驗增進學生之實務能力，以使畢業後能順利適應社會職場環境。課程包括：行政程序、安全衛生、人際關係及服務品質效能等主題之學習與體驗。
description.en: This course is to enable students to participate in service experience in the workplace or schools. Students are asked to explore the learning areas, to expanding fields of study, to develop the cultivate character, and to implement the abilities of practical experience in the work place. After this course, students would have the abilities of service skills. This course includes some topics: administrative procedures, health and safety, communication skills, and quality of service.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為訓練有志於教學服務的學生，提供參與教學協助之服務實習環境，學習運用自身系所專業知能與訓練溝通表達解說能力，輔助教師教學進行，體驗學習到熟稔課程基本理論、課程教材教具準備及歸位、課堂協助教學活動或演示操作教具、帶領討論、課後協助進行課業輔導、解說試題、學習如何批改作業報告、協助監督測驗等實際行動，透過教學相長過程，增加協助教學實務經驗。
description.en: This course is designed for students who are interested in teaching. It provides opportunities to the students to put their academic training in a practical teaching environment. They will participate in various aspects of teaching, e.g. assisting the teacher in the classroom. They will be allowed opportunities to foster their communication skills and the ability to express and explain themselves in order to facilitate class discussion. They will be able to familiarize themselves with the principal theory of the course, preparation of course materials, teaching aids, demonstration of the teaching aids and materials and leading the class discussion. They will also participate in the after class assistance, e.g. academic counseling, reviewing and explaining questions with the students. They will also learn how to mark or grade reports, have the practical experience in supervising tests. The overall goal is to increase and enhance student’s teaching ability through the practical teaching

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh:
本課程目的在培養學生具備企業應用資訊基礎知識，修習課程後預計達成下列目標：
1.協助學生認識商業運作實務，從產業、行業到企業組織，並能瞭解企業中重要職能與分工。
2.協助學生具備資訊基礎知識，包含軟體、硬體的應用，並建立軟體開發、資料基礎觀念。
3.透過實務引導、小組合作與案例發表學習方式，協助學生建立職場應有的態度與基礎技能。
description.en:
1.Ability to integrate (information technology and business management)
2.Ability to apply and implement (information and management)
3.Basic abilities (information technology, management, quantity, and languages)
4.Ability to communicate effectively and function in a team.

notes: 經管四、經管所與最後一哩合開;修課前須經面試

description.zh:
本課程目的在協助學生具備ERP配銷模組實作能力，修習課程後預計達成下列目標：
1.協助學生取得ERP配銷模組證照，強化職場就業競爭力。
2.透過講師示範、案例實作以及上機模擬，協助學生強化系統應用與企業流程整合觀念。
3.採用分組方式協助學生強化團隊合作，透過上機模擬體驗企業應用ERP系統使用情境。
description.en:
1.Ability to integrate (information technology and business management)
2.Ability to apply and implement (information and management)
3.Basic abilities (information technology, management, quantity, and languages)
4.Ability to communicate effectively and function in a team.

notes: 經管四、經管所與最後一哩合開;修課前須經面試

name.en: English Presentation for Academic Purposes & Discussion

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授學術簡報要點、介紹常用句型和字彙，主要加強學生英語口語表達流暢及準確度。透過認識簡報流程與架構提昇學術及工作所需之英文簡報能力。
description.en: A course for students giving oral academic presentations in colleges and universities. Learner outcomes include general academic vocabulary development, listening skill improvement in an academic setting, development of effective note-taking skills, and improved academic discussion and presentation skills. Activities include formal presentations, discussions, and reports.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學年至材料及資源工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生每學期必須撰寫實習心得報告以便評分。
description.en: The course is developed to enhance the on-job practical capability of students. Students are trained for an academic year in corporative company or organizations of materials and Mineral Resources Engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to meet the course requirement for each semester.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得短期體驗光電產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a electric-optic engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time semester. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生於學期間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於720小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at Taipei Tech. During the semester, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than720 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations as needed.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至電子工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the electronic engineering related fields in one of the corporative electronic engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative electronic engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得短期體驗車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time semester. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期間至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期到工業工程與管理相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the industrial engineering and management related fields in one of the corporative industrial engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative industrial engineering and management company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期間至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程以計算機硬體及軟體之基本介紹為始，逐步引入程式設計的觀念與方法，程式設計語言以Python及C語言為基礎，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入C++程式語言。內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練及其在資訊工程上之應用，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計專業之基礎。
description.en: To familiarize the student with basic computer programming concepts. Topics cover the methods for analyzing problem statements, designing computer solutions, as well as an introduction into the syntax and semantics of the Python,C and C++ programming language. An important objective of the course is to present effective methods of program design using modular construction and structured programming notions of sequence, selection, and iteration structures.

notes: 資工系1223實驗室;扎根高中職資訊科學教育計畫
國立台北護理健康大學護理系
國立臺灣科技大學電子系
東吳大學師資培育中心
輔仁大學師資培育中心

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得長期(一學年)體驗車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their long working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time academic year. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full academic year paper to fulfill the program requirements.

notes: 臺灣師範大學英語學系

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用暑假至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during summer vocation, practice and learn the real operation of the management related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

notes: 台灣科技大學 機械系
